tool_description: Provide Black-Scholes Price and Greeks for Vanilla Calls and Puts
name: Black-Scholes
title: Black-Scholes

api_list.name: price
api_list.description: Calculate the Price & Greeks of Vanilla Call or Put

delta.title: Delta
delta.description: Delta of the option defined as the partial derivative of the price w.r.t the spot

gamma.title: Gamma
gamma.description: Gamma of the option defined as the second partial derivative of the price w.r.t the spot

vega.title: Vega
vega.description: Vega of the option defined as the partial derivative of the price w.r.t the implied volatility

theta.title: Theta
theta.description: Theta of the option defined as minus the partial derivative of the price w.r.t the time-to-maturity
